#  BOT Pin Pwm
<!--
@name:  BOT Pin Pwm
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Sets the specified pin(s) to output PWM signals with the specified frequency and duty cycle.
## Parameters

- **duty**: Duty cycle of the PWM signals to be output; setting range
- **frequency**: Frequency of the PWM signals to be output; setting range
- **port**: The number of the port where the pins are located, 1, 2 or 0 for all
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
